Does this 2 for 1 rune page deal apply to the already existing page bundle?
Nope, the reasoning is that you get 8 rune pages (buy 4, get 4 free) cheaper than the 7-page bundle. Putting the 7-page bundle on sale is overkill on their end, unfortunately :c
